institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 8 (City/Province Committee Organization)
contents: Article 8 (Organization of City/Provincial Committee) â‘  The chairperson of the City/Provincial Committee shall be the head of the local government, but shall be part-time. However, when the head of a local government separately appoints the chairperson of the city/provincial committee, the appointed person becomes the chairperson of the city/provincial committee. The city/provincial committee steering committee members are appointed by the city/provincial committee chairperson from among local personnel related to the city/provincial committee's business, such as public officials of local governments where the city/provincial committee secretariat is located, corporation executives and employees, and skill competition experts. However, the chairman of the city/provincial committee's operating committee is in charge of the head of the city/provincial corporation's affiliated organization to perform necessary duties such as holding and operating local and national competitions and executing expenses in accordance with Article 2 of the regulations.
